title: Hasitha Subhashana
text:
I am an MBA student at University Canada West and a Quality Assurance Engineer based in British Columbia, Canada. I bring over 8 years of experience in software quality engineering, automation testing, API validation, and release governance.
My goal is to transition into leadership roles that bridge technical execution with business strategy.

title: Chathumi Bandara
text:
I am an MBA candidate at University Canada West and a Quality Assurance Engineer with over five years of experience in automation, API validation, and performance optimization. My work bridges technical execution with business impact, focusing on scalable test frameworks, CI/CD integration, and AI-assisted quality systems.
Through my MBA studies, I am expanding my technical expertise into strategic decision-making, operational design, and AI integration within business environments.
I approach quality engineering with a strategic mindset: reduce production risk, improve deployment velocity, and align validation processes with measurable business outcomes.

title: Chathumi Bandara
text:
Over the past five years, I have consistently contributed to measurable improvements in software quality and operational efficiency:

50% reduction in regression testing time through automation framework design

65% increase in API validation coverage across distributed microservices

30% improvement in CI/CD pipeline stability

45% reduction in production defects in insurance platforms

35% decrease in manual documentation effort using AI-assisted workflows

My focus is not only technical execution, but sustainable, scalable process improvement.

title: Chathumi Bandara
text:
Designed and implemented scalable automation frameworks using Cypress and Playwright, reducing regression testing time by 50%. Integrated automated smoke tests into GitHub Actions and Jenkins, improving pipeline stability by 30%.




Improved API validation coverage by 65% across microservices using Postman and REST-Assured. Strengthened early defect detection and increased release confidence across staging and production environments.




Integrated generative AI tools such as ChatGPT and GitHub Copilot into test documentation and script generation workflows, reducing manual effort by 35% and accelerating sprint validation cycles.




Developed an AI-driven performance analysis agent as part of my undergraduate capstone research, later published in IEEE Xplore. The system used machine learning models and feedback loops to deliver real-time performance optimization insights.

title: Chathumi Bandara
text:
As part of BUSI 654, I am actively exploring how AI transforms operational workflows, decision systems, and competitive advantage. My professional experience applying AI tools in QA workflows complements my academic understanding of AI strategy, governance, and implementation challenges.
I view AI not as automation alone, but as a structured augmentation layer that enhances human judgment, efficiency, and innovation.

title: Chathumi Bandara
text: Quality engineering should directly support business objectives. Testing is not only defect detection; it is risk management, operational optimization, and strategic alignment. AI serves as a force multiplier when paired with structured thinking and responsible implementation.
